sentences.en: "Do you play chess?" he asked, looking askance at Miguel.
sentences.cn: “你会下棋吗？”他斜睨着米格尔问道。

sentences.en: A waiter looked askance at Ellis’s jeans.
sentences.cn: 一个侍者斜瞟了一眼埃利斯的牛仔裤。

sentences.en: Carrie looked at him askance, half - suspicious of an appeal.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉斜眼看着他, 有几分猜到他要有所要求了.

sentences.en: Disbelieving his unlikely story, she looked askance at Jack.
sentences.cn: 她用怀疑的目光看着杰克,不相信他那靠不住的叙述.

sentences.en: Do not look askance at me from afar.
He looked askance at the offer.
He smiled, glancing askance at her mocking eye.
sentences.cn: 他微笑着, 朝她那神色调皮的眼睛斜瞟了一眼.

sentences.en: Inelegant park men and women behavior is askance at really by person!
sentences.cn: 公园男女不雅行为真让人侧目!

sentences.en: Of course nobody looked askance at that sort of thing in Chengtu.
sentences.cn: 这样的事在省城里并不奇怪.

sentences.en: She looked at me rather askance.
Soon after, he dragged me to the Lower East Side where we met an old rabbi, who looked at us a bit askance and said wisely, "You will have a sweet and crazy life together, " which we did.
sentences.cn: 很快，他拖着我到了东城，我们遇到一个拉比。 他用有点斜视的目光看着我们，充满睿智的说：“你们将拥有幸福而疯狂的生活。”

sentences.en: The kids were eyeing him askance.
The peasants, for their part , looked askance at the intellectuals.
sentences.cn: 农民也看不惯知识分子.

sentences.en: The photograph of Christian that accompanied many of the news stories showed a boy with mussed-up hair and pierced ears with black plugs looking impishly askance at the camera.
sentences.cn: 很多新闻报道配发了一张克里斯丁本人的照片，在那幅照片中是一个头发乱糟糟的男孩，耳朵插着一个黑色的耳塞，顽皮地斜视着相机的镜头。

sentences.en: They looked askance at her suggestion.
sentences.cn: 他们对她的建议不以为然.

sentences.en: They looked askance at us there and talked with their heads close together.
sentences.cn: 他们那边斜着眼看我们,把脑袋凑在一起嘀咕.

sentences.en: We all looked upon it askance.
